name: Pokita & Aku
description:
Pokita & Aku is a co-op platform game in which we must collaborate to solve puzzles and get through the level. Aku has the strength and Pokita the magic, now you have to combine them.

Controls:

Aku
- WASD to move
- Spacebar to hit

Pokita
- Arrow keys to move
- Left Click to select and move boxes 

Contributors:

RHerZ

MHerZ
